info.description: Internal Integrations API for Role Based Access Control.
info.title: Internal Integrations API for Role Based Access Control.

get.summary: List the roles for a tenant
get.description: By default, responses are sorted in ascending order by role name

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization ID of the tenant

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering roles by role `name` using string contains search.

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering resource by display_name using string contains search.

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering resource by system flag.

parameters.name: name_match
parameters.description: Parameter for specifying the matching criteria for an object's name or display_name.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering resource by scope.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Parameter for ordering roles by value. For inverse ordering, supply '-' before the param value, such as: ?order_by=-name

parameters.name: add_fields
parameters.description: Parameter for add list of fields to display for roles.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Optional parameter for filtering by username

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The application name(s) to filter roles by, from permissions. This is an exact match. You may also use a comma-separated list to match on multiple applications.

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: The permission(s) to filter roles by, from permissions. This is an exact match. You may also use a comma-separated list to match on multiple permissions.

parameters.name: external_tenant
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering roles by external tenant name using string search.

200.description: A paginated list of role objects

get.summary: List the groups for a tenant
get.description: By default, responses are sorted in ascending order by group name

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization ID of the tenant

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A list of UUIDs to filter listed groups.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Parameter for ordering groups by value. For inverse ordering, supply '-' before the param value, such as: ?order_by=-name

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Optional parameter for filtering by username

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering resource by system flag.

200.description: A paginated list of group objects

get.summary: List the roles for a group in a tenant
get.description: By default, responses are sorted in ascending order by role name

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization ID of the tenant

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: ID of group

parameters.name: role_name
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group roles by role `name` using string contains search.

parameters.name: role_description
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group roles by role `description` using string contains search.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Parameter for ordering roles by value. For inverse ordering, supply '-' before the param value, such as: ?order_by=-name

parameters.name: role_external_tenant
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group roles by role `external_tenant` using string search.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Optional parameter for filtering by username

200.description: A list of roles for a group

403.description: Insufficient permissions to list roles for group

get.summary: List the groups for a principal in a tenant
get.description: By default, responses are sorted in ascending order by group name

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization ID of the tenant

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the principal

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: A list of UUIDs to filter listed groups.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Parameter for ordering groups by value. For inverse ordering, supply '-' before the param value, such as: ?order_by=-name

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering resource by system flag.

200.description: A paginated list of group objects

get.summary: List the roles for a group for a principal in a tenant
get.description: By default, responses are sorted in ascending order by role name

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization ID of the tenant

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the principal

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: ID of group

parameters.name: role_name
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group roles by role `name` using string contains search.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Parameter for ordering roles by value. For inverse ordering, supply '-' before the param value, such as: ?order_by=-name

200.description: A list of roles for a group

403.description: Insufficient permissions to list roles for group

get.summary: Get a list of principals from a group in a tenant
get.description: By default, responses are sorted in ascending order by username

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization ID of the tenant

parameters.name: admin_only
parameters.description: Get only admin users within an account.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: ID of group from which to get principals

parameters.name: principal_username
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering group principals by principal `username` using string contains search.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Parameter for ordering principals by value. For inverse ordering, supply '-' before the param value, such as: ?order_by=-username

parameters.name: username_only
parameters.description: Parameter for optionally returning only usernames for principals, bypassing a call to IT.

parameters.name: principal_type
parameters.description: Parameter for selecting the type of principal to be returned.

parameters.name: service_account_client_ids
parameters.description: By specifying a comma separated list of client IDs with this query parameter, RBAC will return an object with the specified client ID and it's matching boolean value to flag whether the client ID is present in the group or not. This query parameter cannot be used along with any other query parameter.

parameters.name: service_account_description
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering the service accounts by their description.

parameters.name: service_account_name
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering the service accounts by their name.

200.description: List of principals attached to group

get.summary: Get a list of tenants
get.description: List of tenants in ConsoleDot RBAC

parameters.name: modified_only
parameters.description: Parameter for filtering tenants by those with group or role modifications.

get.summary: Get a list of Org Admins for an account or organization
get.description: List of Org Admins for an account or organization

parameters.name: org_or_account
parameters.description: Organization ID or Account ID for the tenant

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Parameter for retrieving org admins based on account or org.

400.description: Invalid request, must supply the 'type' query parameter; Valid values: 'account_id', 'org_id'

500.description: Unable to connect for URL {url} with error: {error}

delete.description: Specify a role name to delete a Red Hat managed role.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the role to delete.

delete.description: Specify a permission to delete a permission.

post.description: Start process of migration of v1 resources.

parameters.name: exclude_apps
parameters.description: Defines the comma-separated names of the apps. If the permission of the role includes any of the app, it would be excluded from migration.

parameters.name: orgs
parameters.description: Defines the comma-separated names of the org ids. Only these orgs with these id will be included in the migration.

202.description: Data migration from V1 to V2 are running in a background worker.

post.summary: Bootstrap a tenants by org ids
post.description: Bootstrap a tenants by org ids

org_ids.description: A list of organization IDs to bootstrap.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Whether or not to force replication to happen, even if the Tenant is already bootstrapped. Cannot be 'true' if replication is on, due to inconsistency risk.

400.description: Invalid request, must supply the 'org_id' query parameter.

get.summary: List bindingmappings for a role
get.description: List bindingmappings for a role.

parameters.name: role_uuid
parameters.description: Defines the uuid of the role.

200.description: List of bindingmappings for a role.

400.description: Invalid request, must supply the 'role_uuid' query parameter.

delete.description: Delete migration resources, including binding mappings, tenant mappings, and workspaces.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The resource type to be deleted.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The org id identifies deleting the resource within which org. But it can not be used for binding.

202.description: Resource deletion is running in a background worker.

400.description: Invalid request, must supply the 'resource' query parameter.

get.summary: List migration resources
get.description: List migration resources, including binding mappings, tenant mappings, and workspaces.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The resource type to be listed.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The org id identifies listing the resource within which org. But it can not be used for binding.

200.description: Listing the list of resource ids.

400.description: Invalid request, must supply the 'resource' query parameter.

get.summary: View count of tenants with ready flag false
get.description: View count of tenants with ready flag false.

200.description: Total of {tenant_count} tenants not set to be ready.

post.summary: Set ready flag of tenants to true
post.description: Set ready flag of tenants to true.

parameters.name: max_expected
parameters.description: Defines the max number of not ready tenants to be updated.

200.description: Total of 16 tenants has been updated. 10 tenant with ready flag equal to false.

delete.summary: Remove tenants imported via user import job
delete.description: Remove tenants with the flag ready=false or tenants without related objects. To use this endpoint, destructive API operations must be enabled.

parameters.name: exclude_id
parameters.description: IDs of tenants to exclude from the reset operation. Can be specified multiple times.

parameters.name: only_ready_false_flag
parameters.description: If set to true, the query searches for tenants with the 'ready=false' flag; otherwise, it looks for tenants without related objects.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Parameter for selecting the amount of data removed.

get.summary: Get count of tenants imported via user import job
get.description: Returns the count of tenants with the flag ready=false or tenants without related objects.

parameters.name: exclude_id
parameters.description: IDs of tenants to exclude from the reset operation. Can be specified multiple times.

parameters.name: only_ready_false_flag
parameters.description: If set to true, the query searches for tenants with the 'ready=false' flag; otherwise, it looks for tenants without related objects.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Parameter for selecting the amount of data returned.

200.description: Tenants count that would be deleted.

delete.summary: Delete principals without user_id and inactive.
delete.description: Delete principals without principals and inactive..

parameters.name: usernames
parameters.description: Comma separated list of usernames of the principals to be deleted.

parameters.name: user_type
parameters.description: The user type to search principals.

get.summary: Get API document in JSON format
get.description: Get document for Internal Integrations API for Role Based Access Control.

200.description: The API document for Internal RBAC endpoints.

get.summary: List uppercase username
get.description: List uppercase username.

405.description: Invalid request method, only POST/GET are allowed.

200.description: All uppercase username updated to lowercase.

QueryOffset.name: offset
QueryOffset.description: Parameter for selecting the offset of data.

QueryLimit.name: limit
QueryLimit.description: Parameter for selecting the amount of data returned.

detail.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

links.description: The links object for this particular response will be empty, since there is no pagination available for the query parameter

data.description: Object which indicates whether the given service account UUIDs in the query parameter are present in the specified group or not

additionalProperties.description: The response is a map of the form "UUID": (true|false)
